p: The overall prevalence of DR in treatment-experienced patients was 1.8% in Chengdu from 2014 to 2016, which was relatively lower than that in other areas of China, such as Jiangsu, similar to that in Yunnan and also lower than the average rate of Sichuan [ 31â€“ 33]. The DR rate in Chengdu for the past three years was 2.09%, 2.00%, and 1.50%, respectively, indicating that the ART treatment in Chengdu is relatively efficient.
